Portal 2 is a very, VERY excellent game. Being the sequel to the GOTY Portal, I was expecting it to not be as good. But, upon starting and playing the game, I realized I was immensly wrong. The setting is immersive the moment you see it, and it still has the fun, portal-based puzzle style to it. With the addition of many more mechanics (gels, lightbridges, etc.) this game provides many hours of fun and thinking. The ever present GLaDOS is much more cold-hearted, but with the addition of Wheatly, Portal 2 still has the wit and charm of the first game. If you have played the first game, this is a MUST-HAVE. If you are new to the series, get it, and see how you like it. Adding together the awesome story, and a multiplayer option that makes both you and a friend of your choice either succeed or argue together, this game definitley worth more than the $20 it is being sold for. 10/10.
Jogo estraordinário!!! Tem uma historia envolvente e os dialogos (de Wethley e Glados) são fantasticos. Comseguiu se igualar ao anterior. Recomendo com toda serteza!!!

Původní Portal byl experiment, velice povedený experiment. Dvojka si z něho vzala všechno dobré a umocnila to skvělým, delším příběhem, novými zábavnými prvky v prostředí, krásnou grafikou, co-op kampaní a nekončným množstvím uživatelského obsahu ve Workshopu.

Mnohokrát jsem se přistihl při rozřešení nějaké náročnější místnosti s širokým úsměvem na tváři a pocitem v duši: "Jó, jsem dobrej." Této hře prostě není co vytknout.

Tak na co ještě čekáte? Stahujete? To je dobře :)

ragazzi, se non avete questo gioco... compratelo, ora. Vi dico solo che alla fine mi sono venuti i brividi. Gli enigmi sono ben strutturati, abbastanza difficili ma non da farvi sclerare, anzi, una volta risolti da un bel senso di soddisfazione. Assolutamente consigliato!

정말 재미있는 퍼즐 게임. 명작이다. 전작이 퍼즐 조각만 찾으면 되는 것이 아닌 조각을 맞추기 위해 기술적인 부분이 필요해 난이도가 있었다면 이번 작품은 딱 필요한 퍼즐 조각만 맞추면 되는 게임이 되어 플레이어로 하여금 기술적인 자괴감에 빠지지 않도록 착해졌다. 코옵도 정말 재미있고 무궁무진한 스팀 웍샵의 맵들은 포탈로 하여금 끝이 없는 게임이 되도록 허했다.
Einfach nur genial ;) Sowohl die Rästsel als auch die Sprachausgabe sind der Hammer ;) Bitte mehr davon! 10/10

Ce jeu pour moi est juste énorme à cette époque ! Car le scénario était génial et cool, les graphique était magnifique et les personnages avec leurs voix étaient drôles ! [spoiler] Sinon, un moment du jeu, bah j'étais au chap 5 et j'ai réussi à appuis sur le bouton (c'est vraiment le jeu !) et après je me suis dit Fini . Déjà ? Et bah Nan les développeurs ont fait un coup de théâtre ! Et c'était ça pourquoi il était génial ! Dans les autres s'est juste quelques niveaux à la fin voilà tout le monde et content et bah là c'est différant car ils te font quelques chapitres et au cinquième bah ce n'est pas fini [/spoiler] mais bon je ne vais pas vos spoilers la suite non plus ! Mais après il y a eut des moments très tristes pour moi (et peut d'être pour vous), c'est que les voix des Sentry Turret sont mignonnes mais quand tu les poussais (ou les tomber) bah tu te dis "Pourquoi j'ai faits sa ? Je suis un monstre" car un des robots (dont c'est mon chouchou) quand je l'ai bousculé, il a dit au début "Ohhhh (avec un ton triste)" et après avoir rangé son attaque bah il fit "mais pourquoi ?" et même que j'ai failli pleurer :'( ! Mais voilà après le jeu en coop (je n'ai pas tout terminé), il est très drôle et amusant avec un copain ! Car on pouvait réfléchir à deux et donner des indications (car si l'un d'eux n'a pas de micro ou qu'il a un Français et l'autre Anglais, c'est génial pour travail à deux avec des inconnus) mais sinon on ne rigole bien aussi qu'on peut faire la danse, rire, taper dans ses mains avec son copain... C'est génial ! Vraiment ce jeu a vraiment mérité ces récompenses comme jeu de l’année etc. Bref ce jeu je vous le recommande car si vous voulais un bon jeu à deux ou en solo avec des puzzles voilà vous l'avez trouvé ! Et sinon, si valve aura terminé Half Life 3, j’imaginerais bien un Portal 3 ! Avec une nouvelle Histoire etc. ! Donc voilà je dis et je redis ce jeu est juste EPIC et donc moi je le noterais 100/100 à cette époque bien sûr ^^ ! Donc voilà, c'était mon commentaire sur Portal 2 alors maintenant joué au jeu et vous verrais que ce commentaires que vous lisez et bien vrai :) :D !
P:S : Sinon j'ai failli oublie dire "It's Space !" !

シングルのストーリーのみプレイ（前作積み消化中）
空間パズルゲームです。主人公は入り口と出口のワープホールをそれぞれ一つまで壁に打ち込んで、ホールをすり抜けてワープすることが出来ます。途中にある仕掛けやスイッチなど利用して、主人公を特定の地点に到達させて進んでいきます。面白いのは、物理エンジンを利用し、いかに効率よく加速するかを考えながら、人体ではあり得ない場所に移動することです。
初心者に優しく、単純な空間パズルからステージが始まり、慣れと共に難易度が上がっていきます。パズルは非常によく作りこまれています。その為、後半部分でも、考えて解けた場合もあれば、排除法で色々試してみたら自然に解けたというパターンもあります。周りをよくみる；加速の方法を考える；試してないことをする、ということさえ意識すれば、一つのステージで長時間はめられることはないように作られています。
世界観は機械系のＳＦで、美しく洗練されています。登場するロボットのキャラは濃く、毒舌です。結構バカにしてきます。ポータルのナレーションキャラは「ゲーム史上最もむかつくキャラクター」へのノミネート歴もあるくらいです。ドＭにはたまらないナレーションが聴けます。

Where do I even start with this, the first Portal blew my mind just with the concept of "Thinking with Portals" along with being the perfect amount of funny, lonely, and creepy. Portal only had one problem. It was short, like really short 45-60 minutes short. But this is a review for Portal 2 not Portal. This game looks better, plays better, and sounds better than Portal 1. It's funnier, It's longer,(took me 15-20 Hours), and it's written better. Every single thing that could have been improved from the first one was times 10. I won't ruin anything in the story but it's awesome and full of references and easter eggs. Portal 2 is DEFINITELY the best game Valve has ever made, but it's even more than that. Portal 2 is THE BEST game I have ever played. Not Half-Life, Not GTA, Not The Last of Us. Portal 2 is and most likely will always be my personal favorite game of all time. Now here's to dreaming about Portal 3.

A wonderfully-crafted sequel to an already original FPS game! This is, in a nutshell, Portal 2.

Released 4 years after its predecessor Portal 2 offers the following new features:

--- While the core mechanics return some new elements are present and needed for puzzle solving. My favourite was the gel machine. These machines release gel and the gel-filled surfaces can be used to accelerate the protagonist in order to reach a much higher ground. Also, surfaces can be made available for the use of portals with the gel.

--- Again, we have an extremely funny, relatively long and story-based single-player campaign. We have new voice actors (such as Stephen Merchant who usually works with Ricky Gervais - those of you familiar with Gervais's comedies will probably grow to like Stephen immediately) and the usual dark sense of humour is present throughout the single-player adventure.

--- Co-op campaign is now available and demands that the two of you closely work together. Some of the stages can be tough (in both campaigns) but they are still heaps of fun.

--- Graphics have also been improved. As we are in the same facility but after the events of the first episode, many of the chambers have walls that show aging and / or deterioration. This immediately allows players to immerse themselves in the story and realise that many years have been passed since the previous adventure.

The game has numerous mods available and just recently a paint gun mode has been released. As the gel-mechanics was based on a game called Tag: The Power of Paint, it was only natural to see the gun incorporated into the world of Portal. In fact, the creators of that game were hired by Valve and worked on Portal 2.

Portal 2 is an excellent sequel and is worth every penny spent on it! This is a highly recommended game along with its predecessor.

Reprenant le principe de Portal (The First), Portal 2 nous replonge dans le centre d'enrichissement d'apperture science... Scénario VRAIMENT amélioré (découverte de l'ancienne apperture...), durée de vie décuplé, narration toujours aussi épique et humour toujours au rendez vous, de nouvelles possibilités de gameplay avec l'ajout des gels et rayons tracteurs, Co-Op et créateurs de salls de test a disposition... Rien a redire, c'est un incontournable, un must-have

Portal 2 è un secondo capitolo che migliora sotto ogni aspetto il primo, dalla grafica migliorata al gameplay rinnovato, passando per la storia totalmente geniale e piena zeppa di umorismo.

Andando con ordine partiamo dalla grafica, non fa certamente gridare al miracolo ma grazie alla sua semplicità e pulizia, permette un colpo d'occhio ottimo e che non stanca soprattutto per la direzione artistica.

Il gameplay, come ho detto è una totale evoluzione del primo, dove oltre alla possibilità di usare i semplici portali, sono stati aggiunti ponti di luce, flussi di energia, e gel repellente che danno una ventata di aria fresca 
Tutti questi strumenti, più volte, vanno a combinarsi per creare delle soluzioni ai vari puzzle geniali, e che ci porteranno via anche mezz'ora o più di riflessioni per capire come risolverli.

Dal punto di vista grafico si ha un netto miglioramento in confronto al primo sia nella maggiore definizione delle texture ed effetti particellari, che nella varietà delle ambientazioni.

Il punto forte dell'intera produzione, che vi porterà a passare ore e ore risolvendo enigmi di difficoltà sempre crescente, è la storia, che riesce a raggiunge picchi altissimi grazie all'umorismo geniale, misto ad una certa follia di alcuni dialoghi, i quali riusciranno sicuramente a strapparvi più di una risata.

Novità in confronto al primo capitolo, è la modalità cooperativa che prevede una storia totalmente nuova in confronto a quella del single player, la quale diverte e allunga la longevità di circa 5 ore se non più.

Parlando proprio della longevità. tra la storia e la modalità cooperativa, ci si trova davanti a circa 13-15 ore, durata che è possibile aumentare scaricando gli innumerevoli livelli creati dalla comunità o cimentandovi direttamente in prima persona a creare i propri livelli grazie all'editor di gioco.

In definitiva è un gioco super consigliato per tutti gli amanti dei puzzle game, grazie alla cura messa in ogni minimo dettaglio, ed è proprio ciò che lo rende superconsigliato.
Consiglio per godersi appieno la modalità cooperativa, di giocarci con un amico in chat vocale e le risate saranno assicurate!

As sequel to the seminal Portal, Portal 2 had a lot to live up to. Indeed, the game's presentation is of the highest caliber, with excellent voice-overs, a deeper than it looks plot, a surprising attention to detail and a few interesting twists. But games are about more than presentation and the first Portal treated us to new and interesting game-mechanics that created a different experience. 

Unfortunately, this game is not the groundbreaking game its predecessor was. It attempts to be entertaining simply by reusing and slightly expanding the mechanics of the first game. A legitimate strategy I suppose, that would have worked perfectly well, if not for a "small" problem: the narrative of this game is much longer. Unfortunately, the various small additions are not enough to keep things interesting. Even worse, some of these additions, ie the new environments, do not integrate as seamlessly with the mechanics of the game and that may lead to some frustration. 

That said, this is still a decent game and I recommend it. For the most part, it manages to succeed in offering an above-average gaming experience. Just take it in strides and don't expect another revolution, or you might be disappointed.

I prefer Portal to Portal 2. The graphics are a little worse, to be honest, and the little feature of the middle part glowing if you can shoot.. I miss that. But it actually has a better storyline than Portal. <SPOILER ALERT> I was a bit annoyed at the sudden plot twist without an explanation, going from Aperture Laboratories to Aperature Science Innovations. <SPOILER ALERT OVER> Aperture Science Innovations seemed a lot harder than Aperture Laboratories. Actually, I'm not even done with Portal 2! I got it yesterday, (the same day I got Portal), and I finished Portal in a few hours. So I rate it 7/10.

Best Game Ever Made!!

The first portal was good, but it lacked something very important: characters. Sure, GLaDOS was a great villan, but thats about all she was. But in Portal 2, you get everything a great game of this genre should have: funny characters with great dialouge, challenging puzzles (not too challenging though), a decent physics engine, and an interesting story.  it was incredibly fun to watch all the characters morph into someone (or something) that you never would have geussed that they would turn into when you first started playing. Also, for a 3-4 year old game, the graphics are beautiful.  I havn't run into any major glitches either.  I havn't played any of the co-op campaign because I have no friends, so I have no opinion on it.  My only complaint would be that I would have liked to have seen a bit more backstory on Cave Johnson, but this is a very, VERY small complaint compared to how amazing this game is in general.
9/10 would portal again
